LanguageData.CLB_InstallLivingBomb_Remote.label: Install self-detonation device (remote)
LanguageData.CLB_InstallLivingBomb_Remote.description: Implant a self-detonation device in the brain. Can be detonated remotely.
LanguageData.CLB_InstallLivingBomb.label: Install self-detonation device (not remote)
LanguageData.CLB_InstallLivingBomb.description: Implant a self-detonation device in the brain. Can not be detonated remotely.
